remarks: Properties of a simple path between two vertices.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 1-Mar-2018.)
statement: spthonprp $p |- ( F ( A ( V SPathOn E ) B ) P -> ( ( ( V e. _V /\ E e. _V ) /\ ( F e. _V /\ P e. _V ) /\ ( A e. V /\ B e. V ) ) /\ ( F ( A ( V WalkOn E ) B ) P /\ F ( V SPaths E ) P ) ) ) $.
